name: iShares Core S&P 500 ETF
description: The iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to track the investment results of an index composed of large-capitalization U.S. equities. Launched in 2000, IVV is one of the largest and most popular ETFs in the world, providing investors with exposure to the 500 largest publicly traded companies in the United States. The fund aims to reflect the performance of the S&P 500 Index, which includes companies from various sectors such as technology, healthcare, financials, consumer discretionary, and more. IVV's low expense ratio makes it an attractive option for both individual and institutional investors looking to gain diversified equity exposure in a cost-effective manner. The ETF is designed for long-term investors who want to participate in the growth of the U.S. economy while minimizing the risks associated with investing in individual stocks. Additionally, IVV offers a straightforward way to gain exposure to the broader U.S. equity market, making it an essential component of many investment portfolios. The fund is managed by BlackRock, a global leader in investment management and risk management services, ensuring a high standard of operational efficiency and transparency.

seo.meta_title: iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV) | Invest in the S&P 500
seo.meta_description: Invest in the iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV) to gain exposure to the 500 largest U.S. companies. Explore low-cost investment options with high diversification.

faq.question: What is the iShares Core S&P 500 ETF?
faq.answer: The iShares Core S&P 500 ETF (IVV) is an exchange-traded fund that tracks the performance of the S&P 500 Index.

faq.question: Who manages the iShares Core S&P 500 ETF?
faq.answer: The ETF is managed by BlackRock, a leading global investment management firm.

faq.question: What is the expense ratio of IVV?
faq.answer: IVV has a low expense ratio, making it a cost-effective investment option.

faq.question: What sectors does IVV invest in?
faq.answer: IVV invests in companies across various sectors, including technology, healthcare, and financials.

faq.question: When was IVV founded?
faq.answer: The iShares Core S&P 500 ETF was founded in 2000.
